name: Extreme Odyssey
description:
Extreme Odyssey is a game for which the main design concern was to create an engaging and attractive cooperative experience.
Extreme Odyssey is a local multiplayer top-down in which 4 players incarnate Ancient Greece heroes whose mission is to navigate their ship to safety.

Along the way, they will have to defend the ship from Poseidon's minions, maneuver in order to avoid obstacles, and repair the ship if needed.

Thus, the game mechanics aim to encourage communication, teamwork, and coordination, as well as providing a short but intense gaming experience.

Team members:
- Alexandre Pernot Lopes
- Samuel Bourassa
- Dany Ayoub
- Pablo Neny

Sound design and music by Charles Bicari, Renaud Ostrowski & David Boisse
